name: Edgar Jones
text: Quick and friendly service, good location, and plenty of seating. I enjoyed the many options that were available and the ingredients were tasty. I tried the “Two Top”” Sauce, cheese & 2 toppings” so I had the Italian Sausage and Mushrooms. …More

name: Aaron Johnson
text: Incredible experience. We order 8 pizzas and they cranked it out expediently, professionally, and smiled the whole time. They also helped us save money in some places & were very accommodating. Excellent service!

name: Cap
text: Me and my family are visiting the area and found this pizza spot. I decided to check it out due to its review rating and let me say they did not disappoint. I ordered the Green Stripe and customized it just a bit so delish. Both of my boys …More

name: Garrett Wright
text: I asked for gluten free pizza and told them it was an allergy.  They changed their gloves and put a mat under the pizza.  They take the pizza out and put in down on the cutting table.  They take another pizza out and drop it right on top of …More

name: Corwin Hyman Sr.
text: Loved it... pizza built to my preference and not expensive

name: IVON DOUGLAS
text: First time at Blaze pizza. The pizza is delicious and the people are beautiful. I met a  young lady name Jodi and her mother, they were Awesome people. Friendly, humble, and seem to like their jobs. Blaze Pizza was very clean  and calm atmosphere. I love it. Well be back!!!

name: Jack Schweitzer
text: The management and team here are simply great. They took a potentially bad experience and turned it into one of the best experiences I've had at a restaurant. …More

name: Sultan Camp
text: Great value and appreciated the al fresco dining experience.Went with the Build Your Own pizza and enjoyed customizing it. Wish the crust was a little more crispy but overall it had good flavor.

name: Felicia Alli
text: First time going here and I love everything about this place. I love the fact that you can put as many toppings as you want for one solid price. I also love that they sell cups that doesn't need a straw! Say no to straws people :) I ordered …More

name: Sarah Noel
text: Good pizza. Workers were nice when we had questions.

name: Andrew Hill
text: Pizza was delicious as always, curbside pickup is very convenient, employees are polite as always.

name: Jennifer Webbert
text: Got a keto pizza- really not impressed (small and super overpriced), I've had MUCH better cauli/keto crusts from the grocery store frozen aisles.

name: Kim Posada
text: Wish I could give 0 stars, but unfortunately I cannot. Our veggie pizza was delivered with no cheese. When I called to explain this to the manager he was a complete a**, extremely loud, aggressive, and basically said it was our fault for …More

name: Liam Dorney
text: I'm a pizza fanatic and this is a solid choice every time I have a craving. Multiple crust options (keto, thick, etc) and tons of menu options + free customization make this place an easy pick if you want options. I've been in a line to the door and gotten through line with pizza in hand in under 10-12 minutes. They can crank it out!

name: Christa Langley
text: I love the variety that they have at blaze! I always get the create your own pizza and pretty much make two halves that are completely different pizzas. It's laid out where you can pick your dough, either regular, thick, or gluten free! Then there are 4 or 5 different sauces and loads of different toppings to choose from.

name: gregory blake
text: It was a nice experience, I like the food and the service and atmosphere was really good family friendly and clean.

name: M.S. C.
text: I ordered through Postmates.  When I called in, the person on the phone told me 3-4 times there was no pizza with my name on it - even though each time I repeated the Postmates order number and told her it was a Postmates order and the type …More

name: Teddy Mular
text: The Gentleman in front of me ordered 2 Pizzas, then the Guy behind the counter taking orders skipped right over me. I had to stop him and ask if I could order. I was the next in line. Pay Attention Please!

name: Mico Popovic
text: If you in mood for quick ,fresh ingredient  & afforable thin crust pizza, you are on right spot ! Every time I go see movie at Movie Tavern this is a must visit place ! Sometimes busy , but worth of waiting ! Keep it up, good job guys !

name: CLAUDIA PARKER
text:
Cool place and I like the urban feel of it.
I liked the dough but missed a lil more salt...kinda slightly to bland for me. I had created my own pizza. …More

name: Melvin Woods
text: Best pizza in town with plenty of healthy options

name: sunshine
text: Just ordered curbside today. 4 11-inch pizzas. I just really wish my pizza had come with more than 1 broccoli on the entire pizza. (Seasonal veggies “plural”), meaning I only had 1 broccoli on my pizza (sucks bc that’s my fav topping) .. …More

name: Lee Smoll
text: Great made-to-order pizza. Incredible selection.

name: Ry Ry
text: This place is kinda awesome. My pizza was delicious. I had the Green Stripe pizza with pesto. The restaurant set up was nice and it had a small area outside to eat. I would suggest bringing a jacket in if you get cold easily because it`s freezing in there.

name: Mark Berry
text: Alway great pizza....the way I want it.  Friendly and clean

name: Danielle Stanley
text: love this place. fast service and amazing pizza.

name: Jon Milochik
text: Blaze pizza, excellent as always.  Perfect

name: Hazem Elhady
text: Great pizza and reasonable prices

name: Brett Thorson
text: Everything is top notch and great prices too. Everything is nitrate free and almost everything is MSG free except the chicken and ranch dressing. But it is easy to make delicious pizza without those two things. The sodas on tap here are delicious too. For 7.95 there is no need to ever eat frozen pizza again.

name: Donald McKay
text:
Love this place. Pizzas are good, prices are very good and ask for Joey!
He projects customer service from the start of your order.

name: Brian Bieron
text: Quality, quick service pizza. Genuine positive attitudes. Even with a line it takes less time than you would think. Don't bail.

name: Jeff Jones
text: Top notch pizza! Pizzeria quality pizza at the price of fast food pizza. A variety of pies to choose from and a build you own option with unlimited toppings. The manager on duty was very attentive to the customers in the building by …More

name: Pamela Bagdonas
text: Would NEVER get make your own at home again. Dough will NOT roll out no matter what. A pure waist of time, money and gas to get. Live their puzzas but not this do at home

name: Michael Lane
text: This pizza place is awesome. The regular crust is great, but the cauliflower crust is even better. Even if you aren't into health and fitness, it's better. The keto crust is not the best. I wouldn't recommend it. But the cauliflower crust …More

name: Millard Souers
text: The best pizza in Williamsburg, hands down.

name: Bonnie Enderle
text: The pizza is great and always made to order just for me!

name: David Hand
text: Walked over after movie.  Had I thought about it ahead of time could have ordered from the app and saved 10 min.  Nonetheless in store order to ready was just about 10 min plus 2-3 min line wait.  Pizza is good in relation to other pizza …More

name: Jvon72
text: Once you try it your going to Love it!!!

name: Ranald Taylor
text: Amazing pizza, and great employees.

name: Diana Schlegel
text: The food is good. They have build your pizzas and specialty pizzas. They have many different toppings and crusts. And they have salads. The trouble I had was that as soon as I got up to the person taking my order, she said, "How many …More

name: JJ T
text: I love the idea of being able to build your own pizza with as many toppings as you want without the price going up!

name: Jacob Sims
text: Chipotle, but for pizza. Plus amazing lemonade

name: Jesse D
text: Busy place with nice open seating. Nice ordering system and nice menu selection with options for gluten and keto.

name: Brenda Hughes
text: First visit to blaze and I was truly surprised and delighted with my visit. The staff was friendly and the guy that made my pizza Rob was great when putting my pizza together. I was in love with my pizza at first bite! Will definitely be coming back!

name: Marie Woodward
text: Food is good but overpriced. I highly recommend the gluten free pizza dough. They only put a tiny handful of cheese and a tiny helping of toppings on my pizza so that the sauce was mostly showing. For paying $11 for a pizza that was ridiculous.

name: Wilda Kruzinski
text: Food and service are good.  Atmosphere is not.  Very noisy.  My husband and I had to shout to try to speak to each other and still couldn't hear what we were saying.  They don't provide plates for the pizza.  The table where we sat hadn't been wiped off and there was quite a bit of food on it.  Next time, we will get our food to go.

name: Craig Cothrin
text: Best build your own pizza I’ve ever had!

name: Lyddia Yannuzzi
text: Horrible service, but good pizza. The guy making my pizza was high as a kite and VERY rude. Made a standard bbq chicken the wrong way too. Wrong peppers, wrong onions. And the hand off was awful. Rude rude staff. I wish I could say better .

name: David Sherwood
text: This is pizza restaurant where they build the pizza as you wish while going through a line to watch them do so. They had a truly vast selection of ingredients. The sausage was super. Fast and friendly.

name: Howard Smith
text: Brendan was extremely nice and provided excellent service to my sister in law and family!

name: Michelle Ruggieri
text: Pizza was excellent. All the toppings I asked for cooked well. Service was friendly and efficient

name: Keith Wills
text: The service was good and the pizza makers encouraged us to get different pizza toppings we might like since it's all one price. When said and done, the pizza was tasty and uniquely different, from our creation. My daughter said hers was a little burnt on the bottom so be careful to not let them cook it too long.

name: Christine Soucy
text: Build your own pizzas, with plenty of choices from sauces, meats,  vegetables, cheeses and spices. Also, half salad and half pizza combinations. Very tasty.

name: Barbara W
text: Just served my WHEAT ALLERGY daughter a wheat pizza when she ordered gluten free and a glove change!!!!  She ate half of it before feeling an allergic reaction. BE AWARE.

name: d Tek Gaming
text: Me and my wife visited Blaze pizza to try there Keto Crust Pizza and we definitely wasn't a fan of it. It was like eat cardboard with sauce and pepperoni on it I'm glad we shared a pizza because one would have definitely been thrown away. As for the other pizzas I cant comment on but we definitely didn't enjoy it that's for sure.

name: Danielle Payne
text: My pizza was definitely made with love here! The customer service from the staff was AMAZING!! Joe made great suggestions to help me finalize my pizza and didn’t have a problem with my indecisiveness. Rob overheard me forget to ask for a …More

name: Marlene Joslin
text: Great concept! Individual pizzas, huge selection of crusts, toppings and cheeses, made to order as you go down the line and ready to eat 5 minutes later. Delicious and quite healthy!

name: Cleve Taylor
text: Fast, very thin pizza.  Had an excellent inexpensive pepperoni pizza which I shared with a first grader.  We both liked it.  Poor selection of beer for those of us who think "beer and pizza" is one word, but otherwise a good destination.

name: Brett Barden
text: Look how good this looks! The line is always long because it's so good.

name: Brianna Howell
text: Awesome pizza place in williamsburg

name: Tiffany Taylor
text: Great food, I've never had broccoli on pizza before... what a pleasant surprise. However, only 4 stars because they didn't get our order correct and had to wait longer than necessary had they been paying attention. But mistakes happen so all is forgiven. Overall a wonderful place and will visit again.

name: Veronica Svinicki
text: The pizza is good but you can tell the workers don't care about their jobs. Wouldn't recommend ordering online from here if you want your order to be correct/not burnt!

name: Mema Manager
text: Customizable ingredients, so many options. Gluten free crust available. We loved it.

name: D Ricks
text: Nothing like Blaze pizza

name: Clark Welcher
text: This is a great place to eat pizza with healthy vegetables and meat. The atmosphere is wonderful. The workers are extraordinary. I tell everyone about this great pizza place.

name: Na' Robertson
text: It was absolutely amazing! Totally worth the hype

name: Toni Amos
text: Something has happened as of late....please bring the consistency back. I think a retraining on customer service may be helpful as well. Blaze is a good name. I want this location to become great again.  We had three separate evenings with cold/inconsistent orders and finally decided to quit going back for the time being.....

name: J Lag
text: Always an amazing experience. The crew is very friendly and helpful. As a vegan family, this restaurant is one of our favorite places to eat. The kids love it. Very nice atmosphere and clean as well. I strongly recommend trying the blood orange lemonade drink too!

name: Peter Mittiga
text: So a great idea! So awesome to be able to create your own pizza. Fairly inexpensive for what you get. I did create your own pizza which is $8.25 for unlimited toppings or you can pay $6.25 if you just want one topping. I wish this place existed where I live!!

name: DOUBLE MM
text: It was my first tome in the Restuarant and it was EXCELLENT!!! I LOVED the pizza and I practically eat the whole pizza except one slice and my Aunt ate that piece. The servers were Exceptionally Great and they were Perfect at making sure I …More

name: John Sweeney
text: Good service,  great pizza

name: mitchell graber
text: Get ready for some heat

name: Nina Hollins
text: I have had too many errors eating here and can officially say I’m done eating here. It’s been great, but I can’t get passed this continuous number of mess ups... especially after the most recent occurrences. Two instances include a number …More

name: Joshua Epps
text: Food was good as always, but I had to ask the worker to not cross contaminate my pizza with cheese (change gloves, use sauce without cheese in it) then several times as the (assumed manager) reached over her and dropped cheese on my pizza …More

name: J. Seward
text: Love me some Blaze Pizza. I had the Hot Link pizza cause I like things spicy. It didn't disappoint.

name: Mona Longs
text: I absolutely love this place. We try to come often from Hampton. As the only no meat eater in my family this is our compromise fun place to hang❣️

name: Carolyn Stow
text: Great pizza. Sized so each person can get their own with a little left over. Nice variety.

name: Nicholas Ketchum
text: Great customer service and even better pizza. They don't skimp on the toppings either.

name: Radical Sans
text: I frequently go to Blaze's for a decent, relatively inexpensive meal. It's great for those date nights where you want to do something casual but you still want to have a good time. The items on the menu are all customizable per customers …More

name: K Bear
text:
My favorite!! Any time we are near, we dine here without hesitation!

Best pizza ever! Fresh and filling!!

name: Sheara Shanklin
text: The best quick fire pizza!! Anytime we visit Williamsburg it's a must that we visit.

name: Kim Delaney
text: Great choices for the pizza. The drinks are really great.

name: Nick Butcher
text: Service is fast and the product is good. One of the first fast pizza places that listens when I tell them to put "a ton" of a certain topping on. My pizza was drowning in pepperoni which was perfect.

name: Saladin Hall
text: Quick, scrumptious, awesome, amazingly delicious pizza and it's so much fun to build your own. I love this joint!

name: James Cook
text: Friendly staff. Excellent pizza. Fast baking.

name: Truman Brody-Boyd
text: Delicious, always. Staff is friendly and make the atmosphere welcoming and fun. You get to make your own personal pizza, what could be bad?

name: Michael Bane
text: The food was good. Service was ok.

name: Ryland Edwards
text: Great place and food. However, the employee named “Sammi” was quite rude. Not only does she not understand how to coach fellow students peers when they make a mistake, she threw dough across the floor and become very irate when the employee …More

name: Winnona Gadsden
text: Blaze have Very good pizza!! my FAMILY really enjoyed it. We will come back!!

name: Jon Bolkovac II
text: Fantastic concept and delivery.  Pizza was great.  Service was great.  Plenty of options/toppings plus a gluten free crust option.

name: Kelsie Woods
text: Great food, tons of selections. Quick service. Very clean

name: Sandie Powers
text: Awesome pizza.. Great staff

name: timi szeplo

name: nunya biznezz
text: This was my first time to go to Blaze Pizza and I loved it. The staff were all very friendly, humorous and professional.   I'm from out of town but I will remember this cute and delicious place!

name: Riccardo Pinciroli
text: Good pizza, fresh ingredients and great taste! You should try their Red Vine pizza.

name: Christy Jackson
text: My first time visiting this restaurant. I love the way its set up, where you can actually see your food getting prepared. Very clean, prices were reasonable and employees were pretty friendly. Also, I loved the different options for your pizza crust.

name: Wayne Willett
text: Wow.. good pizza ! Great service!

name: Amazing Grace
text: Love love love this place

name: Connor Cole
text: Good food in a timely manner. With the build your own you can put as much as you want on it for just about $10.

name: Laura Hilsendager
text: We had great customer service tonight. All of the employees wore gloves and were extreme friendly.

name: Tiffany J.
text: Pizza is good, but if you have a big appetite,  this is not for you. You'd have to order multiple pizzas to fill your gut happily.

name: Barbara Ugwuebulem
text: Enjoyed it very much , can pick out your on toppings also hasa menu that is unique

name: Timothy Moore II
text: Amazing pizza and so many options. The employees couldn't be friendlier. The blood orange lemonade is the most amazing thing I've ever had in life. I'd trade a new born baby for it.

name: Parker Kim

name: Ronda Williams
text:
I gotta say, these folks are AMAZING!!

It is Pi Day and they are running a special  - which means they are CRAZY busy. …More

name: Jonathan Robertson
text: It's kind of like a subway for Pizza, but don't let that description fool you. Every pizza I've had there has been great and any pizza lover should go at least once. It's also very affordable. Highly recommended.

name: John Dipasquale
text: I really liked the place. The pizza was good and it was fast. It is done assembly line style. First choose your  meal, which includes, the style of pizza, number of toppings, salad or not and size of drink. Move down and choose your sauce …More

name: Philip Unsworth
text: Been here several times, always delicious. Probably because you can build your own pizza! Good toppings & sauce selections, and always fresh. Friendly & fast service.

name: Michael Wostbrock
text: Food was really tasty and well priced, but two of our 7 pizzas were missing an ingredient. Green stripe without pesto and BBQ pizza without the BBQ sauce. 3 stars because this is the second time they forgot pesto sauce on the green stripe.

name: Micheline Schultz
text: Excellent pizza fresh toppings and perfectly cooked crust...

name: Cookie The Small Axolotl
text: I love the service and the pizza is so so yummy!!!

name: Julaine Wade
text: Didn't go thete

name: Daniel Fryer
text: The pizza is very good and you can build your own to what ever you desire. Employees are very friendly and courteous. The order line moves pretty quick,  the only improvement I can see whould be to rearrange where you get your drinks and …More

name: Erin Weilert
text: Always amazing. Rob does an amazing job and is always so friendly and personable. The food is always great and an overall great staff. Plus those dough knots are to die for!

name: Melissa Goodill
text: Get the thick crust unless you like overdone crunchy crust. Not really thick. End up like normal crust. Great beer selections. Like subway for pizza!

name: Jude Coe
text: This place is excellent.  I like how I can still eat pizza but maintain my weight loss regimen because of the smaller portion sizes and fresh ingredients.  The employees are pleasant and the service is outstanding.  The online order feature is convenient and makes it simple to order and pick up pizzas when it fits your schedule.

name: Noah Jame
text: Best pizza ever

name: Ian Pendleton
text: The service was excellent and efficient, the food was good, and the menu was varied without being overwhelming. I also liked that the location was nice and quite, and that it was away from the nearest major Street

name: Barbara W.
text: What a surprise! We checked out their menu online and discovered that they have allergy friendly pizza!!! Can it be true?! YEP!! Such an unexpected, delicious, saucy, crispy, delectable, grilled chicken covered delight! Their food is …More

name: Hugh Nealy
text: Excellent pizza.  I usually get the Build Your Own, which is the best value, IMO.  Pesto garlic sauce, mozzarella cheese, pinch of parmasean grated cheese, Italian sausage, tomatoes, basil, artichokes, pinch of sea salt, pinch of oregano, …More

name: Michael Adkins
text: It's busy and packed most of the times I visited but seem to move the crowd quickly enough.  The food is a good occasional change from the traditional.

name: Eric Mitchel
text: Great pizza allows my wife to get her gluten free pizza and for me to get my gluten full pizza. We both can get our own favorite toppings and still pay less than we would at Pizza Hut or other "typical" chain. You can pick as many toppings …More

name: Nikki T
text: This pizza is awesome.. Vegetarian friendly. The fresh fruit arugula salad exceeded my expectations.

name: Kelly Williams
text: In a really nice part of Williamsburg! Fast & friendly service! Delish

name: Nathan Palmer
text: Very friendly staff

name: Li Cara
text: They have gluten free options even though they aren't super good- they are decent- employees are efficient- some are really nice and some are uninvolved but do their job...

name: Stephen Bellingham
text: Pizza is very good. Build your own or they have a small menu of pizzas to choose from. Either way, they build it right in front of you. Good prices. Will definitely be coming back. Employees were happy and friendly.

name: Randy Jaikaran
text: Super yummy and amazing experience

name: Dylan Jenkins
text:
A good place to get a quick quality pizza. You can make it your own way or get a preset list of pizzas. They have fountain drinks, water, and alcoholic beverages for purchase. The inside is clean and well kept.
I fully recommend Blaze, just keep in mind it can get very crowded.

name: Al
text: I've been to this location a few times while visiting family and I have to say it is great. The employees are fast and know what they are doing, plus they are always friendly and willing to deal with a momentary pause to make a topping decision. Will definitely be returning.

name: Jeannie Power
text: Delicious pizza! The original sauce is great!

name: Veda
text: Great place to create your own pizza. They offer various toppings and sauces.  Service is excellent and staff is friendly.

name: Lorraine Kelly
text: Not impressed

name: Knight Smith
text: Love there pizzas ! Good service! Great pizza!

name: Derek
text: The Chipotle of pizza! After discovering Blaze pizza I don't think I'll be going to many conventional pizza places anymore. blaze let's you customize your pizza and it's ready in a matter of minutes.

name: Sheridan Chandler
text: Good prices. Good ingredients. Fast service,friendly staff. Always a good place to visit in Newtown.

name: Jill Watson
text: Options. Customizable. Fresh. Delish

name: Zinnia Narvaez
text: Good eats at a great price.

name: lawrencia boakye
text: Online order is fast but feels like the count the toppings before they put it on the pizza

name: Scott Austin
text: My boy and I really enjoyed the pizza. The build your own is a good deal because you get unlimited toppings. There was one minor mistake with our order which is why only 4 stars.

name: Fran Mayb
text: The customer service was bad the boy that boxed the pizza was really mean and very nasty

name: Gavin Schumaker
text: Great staff, decent pizza at a fair price.

name: Pierre Bougnol
text: Some might say that Blaze Pizza lacks variety but you actually have three different types of dough (even one that is gluten free) at a dozen of different toppings and four different sauces. …More

name: Aurora Sky757
text: Blaze pizza is by far the best pizza in the state of Virginia! I bring my nieces there every year when  they visit me in Williamsburg. And for the affordable price, they should keep a line out the door and around the corner from open to …More

name: MATTHEW THOMPKINS
text: Out of a party of five everyone throughly enjoined their pizzas and the gluten-free pizza was one of the best I have had. Side note, I have tried many gluten free pizzas and out of all of them this is one of two I would put my name on.

name: Debbie Hatcher
text: First time visit, reminded me of a subway with build your own pizza 🍕, instead of sub.  Pizza was good 👍, crust was thin and crispy!  Employees were very polite and helpful.  They were quite busy, but kept the line moving and the wait was …More

name: Katie Wells
text: I love everything about Blaze. I get the red vine with the spicy red sauce, ovalini mozzarella, ricotta, and roasted garlic. If I didn’t live in Hampton I’d probably gain 50 pounds because I wouldn’t be able to stay away.

name: Allison Considine
text: The pizza is so good! We Also got dough knots and a apple cranberry and feta salad. They were delicious too. The service was good and it was packed when we went in. Great job!

name: Vincent Balls
text: Love it. Was what my wife wanted on Mother's Day...so it's what she got.

name: Kayla Thompson
text: This place is awesome so many varieties of cheese, toppings, and meat for ur pizza! The pizza was so wonderful, I've had many different types of pizza from new york and this is way better! The staff were very polite and the place is very clean and cozy!🤗🤗😜😛😝🍕🍕🍕🍕

name: Samuel Glazier
text: Good location. Pizza was good. Just don't over do it if you have never been to a build your own pizza place.

name: Buzz
text: Good pizza. Quick friendly service. Decent value.

name: Dev H
text: Staff seemed friendly, food was awesome. I liked that I was able to build my own pizza, from the amount and type of sauce to every ingredient. The wait time was speedy as well! Will return next time in in VA

name: Kirk Whitney
text: The best staff award goes to you guys and gals! You always make us feel welcome and you make great pizzas too. Each one of you is awesome at what you do. You really do make the best pizza in town. Keep up the great work!

name: Laura Bonsky
text: Great fast experience.   Daniel the manager was very polite and Mark was super friendly!  Will definitely be back.

name: Cheryl Leiby
text: Thank you for doing this fund raiser for King of Glory.

name: Teresa
text: The pizza is the best I have ever tasted honestly!

name: Sean B.
text: Neat idea to see pizzas made in front of you and made to order with ingredients before you. The pizzas are called mediums I believe but really are about 6 small pieces, almost personal pizza size and that's ok because prices are great. The …More

name: Fred Greenly
text: It was noisy!  Reminded me of eating in a barn.  The pizza was average and the staff was rushed.

name: Adrian Thomas
text: If i wanted to deal with this much attitude, lack of attention, and all around laziness i would go back to my ex-wife. Was going to get food but after the way they "served" me i just grabbed a drink and went on my merry way.

name: Brian Hoag
text: Very good variety and quality. Sometimes they get a little bit lazy making the pizza if you phone it in.

name: Nikida Haley
text: Great pizza place. Good prices. Always busy. Inside

name: Ceann Fiain
text: Amazing pizza new fav pizza spot

name: the person
text: Gluten free is fluffy! Toppings are so fresh and delicious (roasted garlic!)

name: Veronica Svinicki
text: We ordered online. We were supposed to get our 3 pizzas at 5:25 but we had to wait until 5:55pm and they weren't even busy! When I got my pizza home the bottom was all burnt and I didn't receive my pesto drizzle on top! My parents pizzas …More

name: Alicia Palmer
text: Blaze is a favorite spot for my family! We love the food and the setvice

name: Chuck Friesema
text: Did the create your own pizza. It tasted okay.

name: Rebecca Howard
text: Never a bad meal! Fresh made to order pizza. Great prices. Highly recommended

name: Erica Whitney
text: Love this place! Best pizza in town. Great prices. The ingredients are very fresh. We haven't ordered pizza for delivery since Blaze opened! This location is always busy but even when the line is all the way to the door, it only takes about 15 minutes to get to the front of the line. Definitely worth it!

name: Michelle Hicks
text: I don't like poor service, so when i get good service i think it should be commended. I have been here before, but today my pizza got stuck in the oven. The manager came to let me know what happened and that they remade my pizza and gave me the new pizza and the unburnt part of my pizza. Thank you!!!!

name: Ezra Akerman
text: Friendly staff, very helpful explaining and guiding us, and I mean us being 10 in our party, very patient people I might say. If ever come back to the area will stop by definitely also good food

name: Keah Moffett
text: Very clean location. Staff is nice and pizza is always good. There is usually a wait, but it's worth it.

name: Dayton Nichols
text: Fast service friendly staff clean restaurant

name: Christina Palokangas
text: Amazing pizza and service! Everything was perfect, including service

name: Josh Elliott
text: Counter-service, wood-fired pizza with family friendly industrial chic decorum. Came in before the lunch rush on a Friday, seems like peak times could get backed up considerably. Our wait, however, was minimal. End result was an incredibly fresh hand-crafted pizza that every member of the family devoured.

name: Chris Matherne
text: The best pizza in town, period. The build your  own brick oven pizza is my favorite. Eat in or order ahead for hotcakes out, you'll love the pizza.

name: Michael Shon
text: Great pizza, exactly the way you want it topped, and fast. Unlike Favo or Pi, the crust is shaped in a press and is always the same size and perfectly round. The only minor flaw -they just can't seem to keep track of whether your pizza is for take-out, no matter how many times they ask!

name: Estelle Stuart
